content.558291/y 3/H: grandpas_theme/-2000 -1000/farmer 13 23 2/broadcastEvent/addTemporaryActor Grandpa 1 1 -100 -100 2 true/skippable/specificTemporarySprite grandpaSpirit/viewport -1000 -1000 true/pause 10000/speak Grandpa "我親愛的孩子...^我親愛的孫女...#$b#自從我們最後一次講話，已經過去了很多年。你那時還很小...記得嗎？^自從我們最後一次講話，已經過去了很多年。你那時還是個小女孩...記得嗎？#$b#你現在已經長大了啊！#$b#雖然你也許已經忘了我，但我一直都陪著你#$b#雖然...我的身體離開了這個世界，但我的心永遠留在星露谷。"/specificTemporarySprite grandpaNight/pause 4000/speak Grandpa "你來到這裡已經兩年了..."/grandpaEvaluation/pause 3000/speak Grandpa "%farm的未來掌握在你手裡#$b#再見！"/pause 1000/globalFade/removeTemporarySprites/playMusic none/pause 1000/end bed
content.558292/e 321777/t 600 620/H: grandpas_theme/-2000 -1000/farmer 13 23 2/broadcastEvent/addTemporaryActor Grandpa 1 1 -100 -100 2 true/skippable/specificTemporarySprite grandpaSpirit/viewport -1000 -1000 true/pause 10000/speak Grandpa "我親愛的孩子...^我親愛的孫女...#$b#我很高興你召喚了我。也許上次我對你太嚴厲了。#$b#請原諒我。你一直那麼努力，我真為你感到驕傲。"/specificTemporarySprite grandpaNight/pause 4000/speak Grandpa "那麼..."/grandpaEvaluation2/pause 3000/globalFade/removeTemporarySprites/playMusic none/pause 1000/end bed
